fields.name: age
fields.label: What is the patient's current age (in years)?

fields.name: sex
fields.label: What is the patient's biological sex?

fields.name: weight
fields.label: What is the patient's current weight (in kg)?

fields.name: diagnosis
fields.label: What is the patient's current diagnosis?

options.label: Down syndrome acute myeloid leukemia (DS AML)
Myelodysplastic syndrome (MDS) who have progressed to AML
Early T-cell precursor acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ETP-ALL)

fields.name: ever_refractory
fields.label: Does the patient currently have, or have they in the past had, refractory disease?

fields.name: current_refractory
fields.label: Is the patient's disease currently refractory?

fields.name: current_refractory_num_cycles
fields.label: Current disease is refractory to how many cycles of therapy?

fields.name: count_refractory
fields.label: How many occurrences of refractory disease, including the current if applicable?

fields.name: ever_relapse
fields.label: Does the patient currently have, or have they in the past had, confirmed or suspected relapse disease?

fields.name: current_relapse
fields.label: Is the patient currently in relapse (or suspected relapse)?

fields.name: count_relapse
fields.label: How many confirmed or suspected relapses, including the current if applicable?

fields.name: days_between_initdx_relapse
fields.label: How many days elapsed between initial diagnosis and relapse diagnosis?

fields.name: bm_recent
fields.label: Was the patient able to provide a recent bone marrow draw?

fields.name: bm_recent_blast_pct_meas
fields.label: What is the most recent measure of the patient's bone marrow blast percentage?

fields.name: bm_recent_blast_method
fields.label: The most recent measure of bone marrow blast percentage was assessed by which method?

fields.name: bm_recent_stable_increase
fields.label: Does the most recent bone marrow blast percentage measurement represent stable or increased disease burden from a measurement at least 7 days prior?

fields.name: periph_blood_blast_pct_meas
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent peripheral blood blast percentage?

fields.name: ecog
fields.label: What is the patient's ECOG score?

fields.name: active_infection
fields.label: Does the patient have documented active, uncontrolled infection?

fields.name: diag_cong_bmf
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with: any known congenital bone marrow failure syndrome (e.g. Fanconi anemia, Kostmann syndrome, Shwachman syndrome)

fields.name: diag_fanconi
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with: Fanconi anemia

fields.name: diag_kostmann
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with: Kostmann syndrome

fields.name: diag_shwachman
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with: Shwachman syndrome

fields.name: diag_ataxia_telang
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with: ataxia-telangiectasia

fields.name: diag_bloom
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with: Bloom syndrome

fields.name: cns_status
fields.label: What is the patient's CNS status?

fields.name: diag_iso_cns
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with: isolated CNS

fields.name: diag_uncontr_cns
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with: clinically significant uncontrolled central nervous system (CNS) pathology (e.g. epilepsy, childhood seizure, paresis, aphasia, stroke, severe brain injuries, organic brain syndrome, or psychosis)

fields.name: cerebellar_toxicity
fields.label: Does the patient have an history of cerebellar toxicity or cerebellar neurological findings on exam?

fields.name: other_curative_therapy
fields.label: For patient's currect disease state, is there any known curative therapy or therapy proven to prolong survival with an acceptable quality of life?

fields.name: diag_down_syndrome
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with: Down syndrome

fields.name: diag_hiv
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with: human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection

fields.name: diag_hep_b_c
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with: hepatitis B or C infection

fields.name: diag_liver_cirr_serious
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with: liver cirrhosis or other serious liver disease

fields.name: diag_malabsoption
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with: malabsorption syndrome

fields.name: diag_chf
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with: congestive heart failure (CHF)

fields.name: diag_iso_emd
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with: isolated extramedullary disease (i.e. the absence of bone marrow involvement)

fields.name: diag_cong_blood_disorder
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with any congenital bleeding disorders, including but not limited to hemophilia?

fields.name: periph_blood_blast_abs_meas
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent peripheral blood absolute blast count measurement (in cells/microliter)?

fields.name: bm_recent_blast_methods_count
fields.label: The most recent measure of bone marrow blast percentage was confirmed by how many methods (e.g. Flow, FISH, etc.)?

fields.name: bm_recent_blast_log_increase
fields.label: Does the most recent bone marrow blast percentage measurement represent a 1 log increase from a measurement 7 days prior?

fields.name: corneal_epitheliopathy
fields.label: Has the patient had a diagnosis of corneal epitheliopathy or any eye disorder that may predispose the patient to corneal epitheliopathy?

fields.name: cns3_asymptomatic
fields.label: Is CNS disease asymptomatic?

fields.name: diag_iso_testes
fields.label: Has the patient been diagnosed with: isolated testicular relapse

fields.name: hist_g4_vod_sos
fields.label: Does the patient have a documented history of Grade 4 VOD/SOS (veno-occlusive disease/sinusoidal obstructive syndrome)?

fields.name: refractory_transfusion
fields.label: Is the patient known to be refractory to red blood cells or platelet transfusions

fields.name: gvhd
fields.label: Has the patient demonstrated evidence of GVHD?

fields.name: exp_cytotoxic_chemo_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: cytotoxic chemotherapy (not including intrathecal cytotoxic chemotherapy, hydroxyurea, or corticosteroids)

fields.name: exp_cytotoxic_chemo
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: cytotoxic chemotherapy (not including intrathecal cytotoxic chemotherapy, hydroxyurea, or corticosteroids)

fields.name: exp_hct
fields.label: Has the patient had prior exposure to: Hematopoietic cell transplantation (HCT)

fields.name: exp_allogeneic_transpl
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: Allogeneic (non-autologous) bone marrow or stem cell transplant

fields.name: exp_autologous_sci
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: Autologous stem cell infusion

fields.name: exp_corticosteroids_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: corticosteroids (if used to modify immune adverse events related to prior therapy)

fields.name: exp_corticosteroids
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: corticosteroids (if used to modify immune adverse events related to prior therapy)

fields.name: exp_long_acting_gf_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: Long-acting growth factor (eg, pegfilgrastim)

fields.name: exp_long_acting_gf
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: Long-acting growth factor (eg, pegfilgrastim)

fields.name: exp_short_acting_gf_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: Short-acting growth factor

fields.name: exp_short_acting_gf
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: Short-acting growth factor

fields.name: exp_calcineurin_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: calcineurin inhibitors

fields.name: exp_calcineurin
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: calcineurin inhibitors

fields.name: exp_craniospatial_rt_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: Craniospinal radiotherapy (RT)

fields.name: exp_craniospatial_rt
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: Craniospinal radiotherapy (RT)

fields.name: exp_tbi_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: Total Body Irradiation (TBI)

fields.name: exp_tbi
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: Total Body Irradiation (TBI)

fields.name: exp_local_pall_rt_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: Local palliative radiotherapy (RT), small port

fields.name: exp_local_pall_rt
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: Local palliative radiotherapy (RT), small port

fields.name: exp_pelvic_rt_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: Pelvic radiotherapy (RT), if >= 50% pelvis is exposed

fields.name: exp_pelvic_rt
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: Pelvic radiotherapy (RT), if >= 50% pelvis is exposed

fields.name: exp_anticancer_nonmyelosupp_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: non-myelosuppressive anti-cancer agents

fields.name: exp_anticancer_nonmyelosupp
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: non-myelosuppressive anti-cancer agents

fields.name: exp_anticancer_myelosupp_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: myelosuppressive anti-cancer agents

fields.name: exp_anticancer_myelosupp
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: myelosuppressive anti-cancer agents

fields.name: exp_antibody_drug_conj_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: antibody-drug conjugate

fields.name: exp_antibody_drug_conj
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: antibody-drug conjugate

fields.name: exp_interleukins_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: Interleukins, Interferons and Cytokines (not including Hematopoietic Growth Factors)

fields.name: exp_interleukins
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: Interleukins, Interferons and Cytokines (not including Hematopoietic Growth Factors)

fields.name: exp_biologic_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: any biologic agent

fields.name: exp_biologic
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: any biologic agent

fields.name: exp_other_bm_radiation_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: Other substantial BM radiation

fields.name: exp_other_bm_radiation
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: Other substantial BM radiation

fields.name: exp_radiopharma_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: Radiopharmaceutical therapy (e.g., radiolabeled antibody, 131I-MIBG)?

fields.name: exp_radiopharma
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: Radiopharmaceutical therapy (e.g., radiolabeled antibody, 131I-MIBG)?

fields.name: exp_dli_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: DLI (donor lymphocyte infusion) or any type of cellular therapy (eg, modified T cells, NK cells, dendritic cells, etc.)

fields.name: exp_dli
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: DLI (donor lymphocyte infusion) or any type of cellular therapy (eg, modified T cells, NK cells, dendritic cells, etc.)

fields.name: exp_cyp3a_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: Strong inhibitors of CYP3A

fields.name: exp_cyp3a
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: Strong inhibitors of CYP3A

fields.name: exp_monocl_antib_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: monoclonal antibodies

fields.name: exp_monocl_antib
fields.label: How many half-lives have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: monoclonal antibodies

fields.name: exp_immunotherapy_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: immunotherapy

fields.name: exp_immunotherapy
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: immunotherapy

fields.name: exp_demeth_hdac_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: Demethylating and/or HDAC Inhibitor Therapy

fields.name: exp_demeth_hdac
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: Demethylating and/or HDAC Inhibitor Therapy

fields.name: exp_cd123_cart
fields.label: Has the patient had prior exposure to: CD123 directed antibody or CD123 directed chimeric antigen receptor (CAR) T cells

fields.name: exp_anthracycline_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: anthracycline or equivalent

fields.name: cumul_anthracycline
fields.label: How much cumulative anthracycline or equivalent (in mg/m^2) has the patient received?

fields.name: planned_non_protocol_therapy
fields.label: Are there plans to administer any type of non-protocol prescribed anti-cancer therapy?

fields.name: other_investigational_drug
fields.label: Is the patient currently receiving an investigational drug?

fields.name: vpa_meds
fields.label: Is the patient receiving valproic acid (VPA) therapy?

fields.name: prior_solid_organ_transpl
fields.label: Has the patient received a prior solid organ transplantation?

fields.name: exp_flotetuzumab
fields.label: Has the patient had prior exposure to: flotetuzumab

fields.name: exp_venetoclax
fields.label: Has the patient has prior exposure to: venetoclax

fields.name: exp_venetoclax_sensitive
fields.label: Has the patient had previous toxicity or hypersensitivity directly attributed to venetoclax?

fields.name: donor_available
fields.label: Does the patient have a suitable stem cell donor available?

fields.name: exp_cyp2d6_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: Strong inhibitors of CYP2D6

fields.name: exp_cyp2d6
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: Strong inhibitors of CYP2D6

fields.name: exp_cyp3a4_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: Strong inhibitors of CYP3A4

fields.name: exp_cyp3a4
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last exposure to: Strong inhibitors of CYP3A4

fields.name: exp_grapefruit_orange_starfruit
fields.label: How many days have elapsed since the patient's last consumption of: grapefruit, grapefruit products, Seville oranges (including marmalade containing Seville oranges) or starfruit

fields.name: radiation_mediastinum_ever
fields.label: Does the patient have any prior exposure to: radiation to the mediastinum

fields.name: cumul_radiation_mediastinum
fields.label: How much cumulative radiation to the mediastinum (in Gy) has the patient received?

fields.name: lv_systolic_dysfunction_meds
fields.label: Is the patient receiving medications for treatment of left ventricular systolic dysfunction?

fields.name: exp_uproleselan
fields.label: Has the patient had prior exposure to: uproleselan

fields.name: norm_cardiac
fields.label: Does the patient demonstrate normal: cardiac function test results?

fields.name: norm_lv
fields.label: Does the patient demonstrate normal: left ventricular function?

fields.name: meas_ef
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: Ejection Fraction (EF) (in %)

fields.name: meas_sf
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: Shortening Fraction (SF) (in %)

fields.name: norm_qtc
fields.label: Does the patient demonstrate normal: QTc?

fields.name: meas_qtcb
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: Corrected QT using the Bazett formula (QTcB) interval (in msec)

fields.name: norm_renal
fields.label: Does the patient demonstrate normal: renal function test results?

fields.name: meas_gfr
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: GFR (in mL/min/1.73 m2)

fields.name: meas_serum_creat
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: Serum creatinine (in mg/dL)

fields.name: meas_creat_clear_calc
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: calculated creatinine clearance (in mL/min/1.73m^2)

fields.name: dyspnea_present
fields.label: Is there evidence of: dyspnea

fields.name: grade_dyspnea
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: dyspnea grade (CTCAE)

fields.name: hypoxia_present
fields.label: Is there evidence of: hypoxia

fields.name: grade_hypoxia
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: hypoxia grade (CTCAE)

fields.name: meas_dlco
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: Diffusing capacity for carbon monoxide (DLCO) (in % predicted)

fields.name: norm_liver
fields.label: Does the patient demonstrate normal: liver function test results?

fields.name: meas_dbili_mgdl
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: Direct bilirubin (in mg/dL)

fields.name: meas_dbili_uln
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: Direct bilirubin (in ULN)

fields.name: meas_bili_uln
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: Bilirubin (sum of conjugated + unconjugated) (in ULN for age)

fields.name: meas_alt_ul
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: SGPT (ALT) (in U/L)

fields.name: meas_alt_uln
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: SGPT (ALT) (in ULN)

fields.name: meas_ast_uln
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: SGOT (AST) (in ULN)

fields.name: meas_alp_uln
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: Alkaline phosphatase (ALP) (in ULN)

fields.name: meas_albumin
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: Albumin (in g/dL)

fields.name: norm_hema
fields.label: Does the patient demonstrate normal: hematology panel test results?

fields.name: meas_wbc
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: White blood cells (WBC) (in count/mm3)

fields.name: meas_platelet
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: Platelet (in count/mm3)

fields.name: meas_hemoglobin
fields.label: What is the patient's most recent measure of: Hemoglobin (in g/dL)

fields.name: expression_t1517
fields.label: Is there evidence of t(15;17) translocation?

fields.name: expression_som_JAK2_V617F
fields.label: Is there evidence of somatic JAK2 V617F mutation?

fields.name: expression_flt3_itd
fields.label: Is there evidence of FLT3 / internal tandem duplication (ITD) mutation?

fields.name: expression_cd123
fields.label: Is there evidence of CD123 expression?

fields.name: expression_kmt2ar
fields.label: Is there evidence of KMT2A rearrangement (KMT2Ar)?

fields.name: expression_msln
fields.label: Is there evidence of MSLN expression?

fields.name: expression_eselectin
fields.label: Is there evidence of E-selectin expression?
